title: Healthy low GI chocolate cake
ingredients: ['200g wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 egg', '1 egg white', '200g equivalent sugar substitute', '120g apple sauce or apple puree', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '160ml buttermilk', '40g cocoa powder', 'For the icing', '100g 70% dark chocolate', '125g skimmed milk']
